about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of connection and step family bonding with 14 Days of Desire.
After your father's remarriage, your new parents have graciously provided this opportunity for you to spend two weeks getting to know your new step family in a unique and special way.
This will be an experience you will never forget, as you create lasting memories and strengthen the bond between you and your new step family members.
Whether you're exploring new places, trying new activities or just enjoying each other's company.



With many locals eager to interact, you have the freedom to select the individuals you wish to spend your time with, fostering deeper connections and maximizing the benefits of your vacation.



You are sure to make unforgettable moments during this 14 day vacation. So pack your bags and get ready for an adventure that will bring your new family closer together.

content_descriptors.notes:
14 Days of Desire is not suitable for all audiences as it contains mature language, nudity, and graphic sexual content including Oral, Vaginal, BDSM, Pet Play, Prostitution, a Futanari Character, Public Sex, and other sexual acts. The game also has occasional use of alcohol.

All sexual situations depicted are consensual and between adults 18 years or older.

This game has many adult situations, and is suitable only for persons 18 or older.

detailed_description:
Embark on a journey of connection and step family bonding with 14 Days of Desire.
After your father's remarriage, your new parents have graciously provided this opportunity for you to spend two weeks getting to know your new step family in a unique and special way.
This will be an experience you will never forget, as you create lasting memories and strengthen the bond between you and your new step family members.
Whether you're exploring new places, trying new activities or just enjoying each other's company.



With many locals eager to interact, you have the freedom to select the individuals you wish to spend your time with, fostering deeper connections and maximizing the benefits of your vacation.



You are sure to make unforgettable moments during this 14 day vacation. So pack your bags and get ready for an adventure that will bring your new family closer together.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: 14 Days of Desire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: 14 Days of Desire is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. Enjoy two weeks of vacation by exploring the beachside city and its alluring residence while growing closer to your step family
